name: Ylilauta Icy Terminal
description:
Icy theme for Ylilauta based on the standard Terminal theme.

You need to use the Terminal theme on Ylilauta for this to work correctly(change it in preferences)

It should work with most of the content on Ylilauta. I use it myself so if something is changed that breaks the style I'll update it.

user.name: DoomBoom

Version 1.2
Made on 22 November 2012
* Fixed stupid URL thingy making Stylish think the style could apply to any website, even though it couldn't. Now it won't constantly be in the list of active styles.

Version 1.1

* Fixed one of the URLs being incorrect(ylilauta.net instead of .org)
* Added padding on posts for people using old layout style (Thanks, Norway)
